reviewText:
Re:  Great Gildersleeve v1&2
Very disappointing.  I'm an enormous fan of the radio program, but this is a lousy product.  These are poorly edited often missing beginnings of scenes due to a clip too close,  and it's too grainy for  something from 1955.  There are plenty of older programs and movies that have a better picture and sound.
 Your best bet is to watch these on YouTube on a small screen.
This si one of th funniest TV shows ever.  It is different from anything else.  I wish, there there were more epiodes available.
The show was very  funny. It show what goes on  in life  of city person.
I loved the dvds. He is so funny
The disc's arrived in the time promised and in perfect condition. I have watched some of the shows. They bring back memories from my younger days!
Loves these black and white adventures of gildy and his family. Hope to find more to purchase acting has come a long way
